title: 2007년 Scott MacKenzie v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Scott MacKenzie v. State. 판결일: 2007-05-03. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Scott MacKenzie v. State
**판결일**: 2007-05-03
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약








TEXAS COURT OF APPEALS, THIRD DISTRICT, AT AUSTIN







ON MOTION FOR REHEARING









NO. 03-06-00074-CR







Scott MacKenzie, Appellant



v.



The State of Texas, Appellee






FROM THE DISTRICT COURT OF TRAVIS COUNTY, 403RD JUDICIAL DISTRICT


NO. 3041974, HONORABLE BRENDA KENNEDY, JUDGE PRESIDING






M E M O R A N D U M   O P I N I O N



Appellant filed a motion for rehearing drawing our attention to his supplemental brief,
which was received two days before the Court's original judgment and opinion were announced. 
The Court granted leave to file the supplemental brief and asked the State to respond to it and the
motion for rehearing.  We now grant the motion for rehearing and withdraw our previous opinion
and judgment issued March 7, 2007 and substitute the following in its place.

A jury found appellant Scott MacKenzie guilty of burglary of a habitation with
intent to commit sexual assault and assessed punishment at sixteen years' imprisonment.  See
Tex. Penal Code Ann. § 30.02 (West 2003).  The judgment includes an order directing that the
sentence imposed shall begin when the sentence imposed in another cause has ceased to operate. 
See Tex. Code Crim. Proc. Ann. art. 42.08 (West 2006).  Appellant contends that the trial court erred
by permitting the State to introduce evidence of an extraneous offense and that the cumulation order
was improperly entered.  We overrule the firs...
